sentences.sContent: In the past the exam had been overemphasized.
sentences.sCn: 过去，考试受到了过分的重视。

sentences.sContent: The importance of adequate preparation cannot be overemphasized (= used to say that something is very important ).
sentences.sCn: 做好充足准备的重要性怎么强调也不过分。

words.tran: 过分打扮的；穿着过于讲究的
使过分激动或兴奋（overexcite的过去式）
穿得过分讲究；穿得过多
过度装饰；使穿著过分讲究
过分扩展；过分延长；使…承担过多的义务
过分夸大；过分戏剧性地表达

trans.tranOther: to give something more importance than it deserves or than is suitable
